summary.Title: Cleaning assistent
summary.Presentation:
Cleaning assistent - 
Cleanspot.dk expands the company within cleaning.
we are now looking for a new colleague for our cleaning team.
We are a company that is in a development.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Cleaning assistent - 

Cleanspot.dk expands the company within cleaning.

we are now looking for a new colleague for our cleaning team.

We are a company that is in a development.

That is why we want to expand our customer portfolio within cleaning.

The working hours will initially be within 10-30 hours per week.

But we are constantly expanding, so there will be an opportunity to get more working hours.

The work schedule will be within normal working hours, but there may be weekends and evenings.

We are looking for someone who:

- Is happy and outgoing

-Has Danish or English skills

-able to work independently

-solution-oriented

We can offer a workplace where the ceiling is high and everyone is treated equally. Our customers are both private and companies.

The work environment is important to us, as our employee is the one who sees our customers, and therefore it is important that our employees is well being.

We work with everything within cleaning, such as: stair washing, Craftsman cleaning, private cleaning, office etc.

We look forward to hear from you. Write "PART TIME" i the subject field
